nav.div: Pelham City Schools » News & Info » News About Our Schools » News Feed » COVID-19 School Closure FAQs

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.3px; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);
span.span: We've compiled student and parent questions and created a FAQs document. While we don't have definitive answers to all questions, we have provided the best information we have at this time.
Additionally, a separate document for Pelham High School FAQs is linked in the document. The FAQs will be continuously updated as we receive new guidance and answers are determined.
